casebody.data:
CARDIORENTIS AG
v.
IQVIA LTD. and Iqvia RDS, Inc. 168A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 J. Dickson Phillips, III, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, Jonathan C. Krisko, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Cardiorentis AG. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Shepard D. O'Connell, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Iqvia Ltd. and Iqvia RDS, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of May 2019 by Defendants to admit Robert Thomas Cahill, Jr. Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
